entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
